features.description: No extra libraries. Just plain React. Drop it into your project and start dragging and dropping.
features.title: Zero-Dependencies

features.description: Comes with a hook to toggle between a skeleton loader and the board, ensuring styles and scripts are loaded before interaction for a snappy, flicker-free experience.
features.title: CSS & Performance Assurance

features.description: Built-in keyboard controls and screen-reader announcements ensure everyone can manage tasks.
features.title: Accessibility-First

features.description: Automatically adapts to your Shadcn color scheme for perfect visual integration with light an dark mode.
features.title: Seamless Theming

features.description: Works equally well with local state, React Router v7 actions, or Next.js server actions, and so on ... No lock-in!
features.title: Framework-Agnostic

description.subtitle: Get up and running in minutes with a production-ready, accessible, and themeable Kanban board built on Shadcn/UI.
description.title: Easily customize this Kanban board

items.answer: Yes! This is an open-source project and is free to use under the MIT license.
items.question: Is this free?

items.answer: Glad you asked! We're always looking for help with the project. If you're interested in contributing, please check out our <1>contributing guide</1> for more information.
items.question: How do I contribute?

items.answer: You can ask in GitHub discussions. If you're interested in professional help building your app from senior React developers, reach out to us at <1>ReactSquad</1>.
items.question: I'm stuck! Where can I get help?

items.answer: Thank you so much! You can follow Jan Hesters on <1>X</1>, <2>LinkedIn</2>, or <3>YouTube</3>, and drop a thank you. And if you know anyone who needs senior React developers, please recommend <4>ReactSquad</4>. Thank you!
items.question: This is awesome! How can I support you?

hero.description: Kickstart your B2B & B2C SaaS apps with this <1>open-source</1> Shadcn Kanban Board built with React and Tailwind CSS.
hero.title: Kanban Board
